profile.name: Ismail HARIK
profile.about:
As a skilled computer science and software engineer developer, I have a strong passion for building innovative solutions and learning new technologies. With a solid foundation in Java programming, Spring Ecosystem, and Angular, I am well-equipped to design and develop robust and scalable applications that meet business requirements. I have hands-on experience in developing applications based on Microservices Architecture and utilizing technologies such as Spring Cloud, Docker, and Kubernetes.

Additionally, I have strong problem-solving and analytical skills that enable me to troubleshoot complex issues and optimize performance. My knowledge of SQL,NoSQl allows me to design efficient data models and manage large data sets.

Furthermore, I am a self-motivated and proactive individual with excellent communication and collaboration skills. I have volunteered in various projects and competitions, including the MNPC Contest and the national hackathon of ENSETM , where I honed my teamwork and time-management skills. As the Vice President and Co-Founder of the Computer and Engineering Club, I have organized conferences and competitions that promote knowledge-sharing and learning opportunities for students in IT fields.

experiences.title: Code Quality & Design Patterns Enthusiast
experiences.description:
Passionate about crafting high-quality code for robust software design, I share insights on code quality and design patterns through my blogs on Hashnode, aiming to contribute to a community of developers dedicated to excellence. I actively engage in in-depth research to deepen my understanding of complex software engineering topics. This approach not only enhances my knowledge but also allows me to better comprehend the subjects I discuss.

experiences.title: Full-Stack Software Engineer | Spring Boot, Angular, AWS
experiences.company: fondation des œuvres sociales de l'enseignement · Part-time
experiences.description:
💻 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Engineered a Spring Boot platform handling 18,000 monthly orders, transforming meal selection and order management.
🍴 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐜 𝐌𝐞𝐧𝐮 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Implemented a customizable daily menu system, enabling managers to strategically plan weekly menus for customers. This feature allows managers to suggest meal orders, enhancing customer satisfaction. Additionally, it includes a deadline feature for each daily menu, post which customers cannot view or order from that day's menu, allowing managers to efficiently prepare meals based on confirmed orders.
💳 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Established a robust payment system with budget adherence and traceable financial logs for user security.
📊 𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐫 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: Developed dual user interfaces for administration/management and end-users, with features like balance checks, menus, and order tracking.
📈 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲: Enabled effective product choice management and supply chain operations for restaurant managers.
📉 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠: Designed data tables for analyzing order trends, aiding in preparation and administrative efficiency.
🔧 𝑻𝒆𝒄𝒉 𝑺𝒕𝒂𝒄𝒌: Java 17, Spring Boot 3 LST, Angular 16 LST, Docker, AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, S3, EC2, CloudFront, Route53), MySQL, Angular Material, Node.js 18.12 LST.
𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚𝐛𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐄𝐧𝐡𝐚𝐧𝐜𝐞𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Optimized database structures by refining column configurations, resulting in improved data retrieval efficiency and performance.
𝐅𝐫𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐧𝐝 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲: Enhanced frontend performance by selectively minimizing Angular Material modules, 𝘚𝘵𝘢𝘯𝘥𝘢𝘭𝘰𝘯𝘦 𝘊𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘰𝘯𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘴, 𝘚𝘪𝘨𝘯𝘢𝘭𝘴, 𝘪𝘮𝘱𝘭𝘦𝘮𝘦𝘯𝘵𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘭𝘢𝘻𝘺 𝘭𝘰𝘢𝘥𝘪𝘯𝘨, 𝘢𝘯𝘥 𝘶𝘵𝘪𝘭𝘪𝘻𝘪𝘯𝘨 𝘨𝘻𝘪𝘱 𝘤𝘰𝘮𝘱𝘳𝘦𝘴𝘴𝘪𝘰𝘯 for better load times.
💻 𝐒𝐜𝐚𝐥𝐚𝐛𝐥𝐞 𝐏𝐥𝐚𝐭𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐦 𝐃𝐞𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐨𝐩𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭: Engineered a Spring Boot platform handling 18,000 monthly orders, transforming meal selection and order management. 🍴 𝐃𝐲𝐧𝐚𝐦𝐢𝐜 𝐌𝐞𝐧𝐮 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Implemented a customizable daily menu system, enabling managers to strategically plan weekly menus for customers. This feature allows managers to suggest meal orders, enhancing customer satisfaction. Additionally, it includes a deadline feature for each daily menu, post which customers cannot view or order from that day's menu, allowing managers to efficiently prepare meals based on confirmed orders. 💳 𝐒𝐞𝐜𝐮𝐫𝐞 𝐏𝐚𝐲𝐦𝐞𝐧𝐭 𝐒𝐲𝐬𝐭𝐞𝐦: Established a robust payment system with budget adherence and traceable financial logs for user security. 📊 𝐔𝐬𝐞𝐫 𝐈𝐧𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐟𝐚𝐜𝐞 𝐃𝐞𝐬𝐢𝐠𝐧: Developed dual user interfaces for administration/management and end-users, with features like balance checks, menus, and order tracking. 📈 𝐎𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧𝐚𝐥 𝐄𝐟𝐟𝐢𝐜𝐢𝐞𝐧𝐜𝐲: Enabled effective product choice management and supply chain operations for restaurant managers. 📉 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐬 𝐚𝐧𝐝 𝐑𝐞𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐢𝐧𝐠: Designed data tables for analyzing order trends, aiding in preparation and administrative efficiency. 🔧 𝑻𝒆𝒄𝒉 𝑺𝒕𝒂𝒄𝒌: Java 17, Spring Boot 3 LST, Angular 16 LST, Docker, AWS (Lambda, API Gateway, S3, EC2, CloudFront, Route53), MySQL, Angular Material, Node.js 18.12 LST. experiences.title: A MODERN AND SECURE RENTAL CARS APPLICATION BASED ON MICROSERVICES ARCHITECTURE
experiences.description:
• Designed and implemented a microservices-based architecture that makes the application highly efficient, flexible, and resilient, allowing it to handle large volumes of traffic while maintaining an excellent user
experience.
• Created multiple search filters for users to find the ideal rental car, improving the application’s usability and convenience.
• Developed a dashboard that helps the owner easily manage resources and track rent evolution through multiple charts, enhancing their business operations and decision-making.
• Tools used: Spring Cloud 2022.0.0-RC2, Spring Security Keycloak, Docker Docker-compose, and Angular 13 to develop and deploy the application.

profile.name: Zakariyae ABBIH
profile.about:
In my development journey so far, I’ve created a range of applications:

- Bookstore (MERN stack): A full-featured web application for book enthusiasts to browse, purchase, and review books.
- Tic-Tac-Toe Game (Next.js): A fun, interactive browser-based game built to sharpen my frontend skills with React and Next.js.
- E-commerce API (Django REST Framework): A robust backend API for an e-commerce platform, enabling secure user authentication and seamless transaction handling.
- Blog API (Django REST Framework): A RESTful API backend for a blogging platform, optimized for performance and scalability.
- Blog Application (Server-client architecture with Django DRF and React.js): A complete blogging platform with a Django REST API and a responsive React frontend.
- E-commerce Website (Django): A dynamic, user-friendly website with product browsing, cart functionality, and secure checkout built using Django.
- Job Board (Django): A platform for job seekers and employers to connect, built with Django’s powerful backend capabilities.
- Assignment Tracker (Flask): A productivity tool for students and educators to track assignments, deadlines, and progress.
These projects have allowed me to build practical skills with JavaScript, React, Node.js, Django, Flask, and Django REST Framework, and I’m comfortable working in both frontend and backend environments. I’m continually improving my coding abilities and expanding my knowledge in areas like RESTful API development, client-server architecture, and user experience design.

I’m eager to bring my technical skills and dedication to a professional setting where I can contribute to impactful projects and grow alongside experienced developers. If you’re seeking an enthusiastic entry-level developer with a strong foundation and a hunger for learning, let’s connect!

experiences.title: Full Stack Developer - Portfolio Platform Project
experiences.description:
An innovative application I developed that allows users to showcase their professional portfolios. 
This application is ideal for job seekers and anyone looking to enhance their digital presence, offering a unique and effective way to present their professional identity in a simple and engaging manner.
🔷 Tasks and Achievements:
● Developed an elegant interface to showcase professional portfolios.
● Developed a system to manage social media and business links.
● Integrated authentication using NextAuth.js
● Created a QR code generation feature to facilitate sharing the Portfolio via mobiledevices.
● Implemented automatic translation for the Portfolio, helping reach a wider audience.
● Integrated a chat system within the app to enhance communication between users.
● Added an option to customize the background color of the Portfolio to match the user’spersonal style.

This project reflects my abilities as a Full Stack Developer and my interest in providing innovative solutions in the field of web application development.
An innovative application I developed that allows users to showcase their professional portfolios. This application is ideal for job seekers and anyone looking to enhance their digital presence, offering a unique and effective way to present their professional identity in a simple and engaging manner. 🔷 Tasks and Achievements: ● Developed an elegant interface to showcase professional portfolios. ● Developed a system to manage social media and business links. ● Integrated authentication using NextAuth.js ● Created a QR code generation feature to facilitate sharing the Portfolio via mobiledevices. ● Implemented automatic translation for the Portfolio, helping reach a wider audience. ● Integrated a chat system within the app to enhance communication between users. ● Added an option to customize the background color of the Portfolio to match the user’spersonal style. This project reflects my abilities as a Full Stack Developer and my interest in providing innovative solutions in the field of web application development.
